mapper.update: update l_option set optionid=optionid ,optionname=#{optionname} ,optioncode=#{optioncode} ,optionvalue=#{optionvalue} ,enableflag=#{enableflag} ,remark=#{remark} where optionid=#{optionid}

update l_option set optionid=optionid ,optionname=#{optionname} ,optioncode=#{optioncode} ,optionvalue=#{optionvalue} ,enableflag=#{enableflag} ,remark=#{remark} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} where 1=1 and optionid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and optionid =#{Where_Id} and optionid=#{Where_optionid} and optionname=#{Where_optionname} and optioncode=#{Where_optioncode} and optionvalue=#{Where_optionvalue} and enableflag=#{Where_enableflag} and remark=#{Where_remark} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.optionid "optionid", t.optionname "optionname", t.optioncode "optioncode", t.optionvalue "optionvalue", t.enableflag "enableflag", t.remark "remark", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_option t where optionid=#{optionid}

select t.optionid "optionid", t.optionname "optionname", t.optioncode "optioncode", t.optionvalue "optionvalue", t.enableflag "enableflag", t.remark "remark", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_option t where 1=1 and t.optionid=#{optionid} and t.optionname=#{optionname} and t.optioncode=#{optioncode} and t.optionvalue=#{optionvalue} and t.enableflag=#{enableflag} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select t.optionid "optionid", t.optionname "optionname", t.optioncode "optioncode", t.optionvalue "optionvalue", t.enableflag "enableflag", t.remark "remark", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_option t where 1=1 and t.optionid=#{optionid} and t.optionname=#{optionname} and t.optioncode=#{optioncode} and t.optionvalue=#{optionvalue} and t.enableflag=#{enableflag} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
mapper.delete: delete from l_option where 1=1 and optionid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and optionid =#{Where_Id} and optionid=#{Where_optionid} and optionname=#{Where_optionname} and optioncode=#{Where_optioncode} and optionvalue=#{Where_optionvalue} and enableflag=#{Where_enableflag} and remark=#{Where_remark} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.optionid "optionid", t.optionname "optionname", t.optioncode "optioncode", t.optionvalue "optionvalue", t.enableflag "enableflag", t.remark "remark", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_option t where 1=1 and t.optionid=#{optionid} and t.optionname=#{optionname} and t.optioncode=#{optioncode} and t.optionvalue=#{optionvalue} and t.enableflag=#{enableflag} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select count(*) from l_option t where 1=1 and t.optionid=#{optionid} and t.optionid!=#{NoId} and t.optionname=#{optionname} and t.optioncode=#{optioncode} and t.optionvalue=#{optionvalue} and t.enableflag=#{enableflag} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
select * from l_option where 1=1 and groupid is null and companyid is null and graindepotid is null and optioncode=#{optioncode}

select * FROM l_option where 1=1 and graindepotid=1 UNION all select * from l_option where groupid is NULL and companyid is NULL and graindepotid is null and optioncode not in (select optioncode FROM l_option where 1=1 and graindepotid=1 )
